PHRASE.LANG: This couch is modeled after one of the the most feared and respected private ships in the galaxy. The modified Firespray-class patrol and attack craft is the ship of the legendary bounty hunter, Boba Fett. [#Legal]

Ce canapé a été conçu d'après l'un des vaisseaux privés les plus respectés et les plus craints de la galaxie. Ce vaisseau de patrouille et d'attaque de classe Firespray est celui du légendaire chasseur de primes, Boba Fett. [#Legal]

Dieses Sofa ist einem der gefürchtetsten und am meisten respektierten Privatschiffe der Galaxis nachempfunden. Das modifizierte Patrouillen- und Angriffsschiff der Firespray-Klasse ist das Schiff des legendären Kopfgeldjägers Boba Fett.[#Legal]

Questo divano è realizzato sul modello di una delle navi private più temute e rispettate della galassia. Il vascello d'assalto modificato è la nave del leggendario cacciatore di taglie Boba Fett.[#Legal]

Este sofá ha sido modelado a imagen de una de las más temidas y respetadas naves privadas de la galaxia. La nave modificada de patrulla y ataque clase Firespray es la nave del legendario cazador de recompensas, Boba Fett.[#Legal]

This couch is modeled after one of the the most feared and respected private ships in the galaxy. The modified Firespray-class patrol and attack craft is the ship of the legendary bounty hunter, Boba Fett. [#Legal]

This couch is modeled after one of the the most feared and respected private ships in the galaxy. The modified Firespray-class patrol and attack craft is the ship of the legendary bounty hunter, Boba Fett. [#Legal]
